verses.1: “Mihingte a nuntak hun tom mahmah a, lungkhamna tawh kidim hi.
verses.2: Amaute paak bangin khangin keu pak uh a, niliim bangin pai hanhanin, mangthang uh hi.
verses.3: Pasian aw, tua bang lel mi kei hong en a, thukhenna a thuak dingin na mai ah hong sam na hi hiam?
verses.4: Mihing banga a ninte sung panin a siang hong piang lo ding hi.
verses.5: A nuntak tan ding kiseh khol a, a nuntak kha phazah ding kiciangtan khin hi. Nangmah in na ciangtan khin a, kikheel thei nawn lo hi.
verses.6: Amah en loin tua ci omsak mai inla, a nuntak haksapi mah zomzomsak hoh in.
verses.7: “A kiphuk khin sa singkung nangawn in lametna nei buang a, a bul sel kikin nungtakik thei hi.
verses.8: Lei sungah a zungte teek a, a bulsum a si zongin,
verses.9: guahtui ngahin, singkungno-in hong selkik hi.
verses.10: Ahi zongin mi si a, amah maimang pah hi. Amah a beina tung ta a, koi ah om nawn ahi hiam?
verses.11: “Gun tuite le tuipi tuite a kan hun om thei ding hi.
verses.12: Ahi zongin vanpi a om lai teng, misite thokik ngei lo dinga, a ihmutna panun khanglo ngei lo, gamtang ngei lo ding uh hi.
verses.13: “Hih gimna tawh ka kipelh theih nadingin nong phawk loh nading mun misiteʼ gam sungah kei hong busak in. Mi a si khin sate hingkik thei lo ahih manin a hingin hong omsak peuh lecin tua lai ah ka ut hi. Na hehna a dam ciangin hong phawkkik peuh lecin tua lai ah ka ngak nuam hi.
verses.15: Tua khit ciangin kei na hong sam dinga, keʼn kong dawng ding hi. Nangma bawl sa ahi keimah na hong lunggulh ding hi.
verses.16: Tua hun ciangin ka kalsuanna khempeuh nong en dinga, ahi zongin ka khialhnate nong sulzuih nawn kei ding hi.
verses.17: Ka khialhnate hong maisakin, nong paih khiatsak dinga, ka mawhna khempeuh nong phiatkhiatsak ding hi. Tu-a bangin a piang thei hileh ka ut mahmah hi.
verses.18: “Ahi zongin a taktakin, mualte a puk ding hun suangkeente nangawn a cip ding hun hong tung ding hi.
verses.19: Tui in suangte nawt khia-in, guahtui in lei a nawtkhiat bangin nangmah in mihingteʼ lametna na beisak hi.
verses.20: Nangmah in mi khat zo gawpin na hawl khia a, na sa mahmah ahih manin a si dingin a ha a li hi.
verses.21: Amah a pahtawi dingin a tapate hong pai taleh zong amah gim lua ahih manin bangmah phawk zo nawn lo a, a tapate mindai taleh zong bangmah phawk zo nawn lo hi.
verses.22: A pumpi sunga a natnate le a lungsim gimnate bek a phawk zo lai hi,” a ci hi.
